Summary: {dr}orange lights that split in less then 10 minutes
divs: Sighting Detailsthe ufo had an orange glow with a large transparent ring around it. this i then came bak to no more than 10 minutes later to find it seemed to be split in to but only with a small spacing between them.it did not move that i an aware of and has yet to after another 5 minutes of pure observation. there was no sound to be heard but i tseemed to far away to be able to be heard anyway even if i do live in a quiet part of the town. these lights only 3 minutes left unseen by my friends and i are gone with no distinct air trace.
